Text:
hey het zijn de scamnerds weer :')

fuck off!!


scam -_-

Here goes:
1. This is an international torrent site with an accepted common language. When in Rome...
2. If you really, really must insist on duking it out in Dutch, grammar, it helps. I know, writing is hard.
3. This torrent could use some warnings, advise, or better yet, a full blown tutorial. But as noted above, writing is hard. Much harder than taking someone else's software, adding a link to a website which, at the very least, has a scammy feel to it, uploading it to some torrent sites anonymously, and then defending it religiously. Or so it would appear.
4. Die in a fire.

Finally, for those that have a genuine interest in some up-to-date information on the topic, here are some links that might help...

Noob starter guide:
http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=173713
Some terminology explained, at least to some extent.

CompleteSoftmodGuide
http://sites.google.com/site/completesg/
Information-rich website dedicated to softmodding the Wii.
